Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at 18th/Blue Island
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Ashland, Cermak, Loomis and 16th: due to, street blockage near 18th/Blue Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #82 Kimball -Homan Temporary Reroute at Douglas/St. Louis
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball -Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, 16th and Central Park due to street blockage at Douglas/St. Louis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Francisco
ShortDescription: Westbound 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Western, Lawrence and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Francisco.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
